cluster_information.name: Boolean State Configuration
cluster_information.description: This cluster is used to configure a boolean sensor, including optional state change alarm features and configuration of the sensitivity level associated with the sensor.

parameters.name: AlarmsToSuppress
parameters.description: This field SHALL indicate the alarm modes to suppress.

parameters.name: AlarmsToEnableDisable
parameters.description: This field SHALL indicate the alarm modes to either enable or disable depending on the bit status, as specified for the AlarmsEnabled attribute.

attributes.name: CurrentSensitivityLevel
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the currently selected sensitivity level.

attributes.name: SupportedSensitivityLevels
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the number of supported sensitivity levels by the device.

attributes.name: DefaultSensitivityLevel
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the default sensitivity level selected by the manufacturer.

attributes.name: AlarmsActive
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate which specific alarm modes on the server are currently active.

attributes.name: AlarmsSuppressed
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate which specific alarm modes on the server are currently suppressed.

attributes.name: AlarmsEnabled
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the alarm modes that will be emitted if the sensor is triggered.

attributes.name: AlarmsSupported
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the alarms supported by the sensor.

attributes.name: SensorFault
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate any faults registered by the device.

events.name: AlarmsStateChanged
events.description: This event SHALL be generated after any bits in the AlarmsActive and/or AlarmsSuppressed attributes change.

fields.name: AlarmsActive
fields.description: This field SHALL indicate the state of active alarm modes, as indicated by the AlarmsActive attribute, at the time the event was generated.

fields.name: AlarmsSuppressed
fields.description: This field SHALL indicate the state of suppressed alarm modes, as indicated by the AlarmsSuppressed attribute, at the time the event was generated.

events.name: SensorFault
events.description: This event SHALL be generated when the device registers or clears a fault.

fields.name: SensorFault
fields.description: This field SHALL indicate the value of the SensorFault attribute, at the time this event is generated.
